name: AndroidManifest Dangerous ProtectionLevel of Permission Checking
description: The protection level of the below classes is "dangerous", allowing any other apps to access this permission (`AndroidManifest.xml`). The app should declare the permission with the `"android:protectionLevel"` of "signature" or "signatureOrSystem" so that other apps cannot register and receive messages for this app. `android:protectionLevel="signature"` ensures that apps which request a permission must be signed with the same certificate as the application that declared the permission.
